author: Josh Barro
title: Why the Fed Was the Part of Government Most Ready for This Crisis
description: Lessons the institution learned from 2008 have served it well amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content: As other countries have looked enviously at South Koreas effective response to the coronavirus crisis, we keep hearing that that country had the advantage of a dry run: In 2015, South Korea faced an outbreak of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, a coronavirus … [+7077 chars]
